Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct Dial Telephone, Fax & modem links, Safe, Balcony. Central Heating, Breakfast Room, Room Service, Laundry. Conference facilities up to 50 persons.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Nea Anchialos Beach - 30m, Volos - 18km south, Almyros - 16km north, Larissa - 62km.
